data.name: Frontline Grunt
data.detailed_description:
A First-Person Shooter game in which the main goal is to capture and secure objectives in a level and winning by draining other team's conquest points.
As a "Grunt" you have a selection of four classes to pick from and a 5th unlocks if your good at gaining score points with a selection of vehicles at your disposal to hit the frontline and achieve victory on various landscapes featuring all four weather seasons.
data.about_the_game:

As a "Grunt" you have a selection of four classes to pick from and a 5th unlocks if your good at gaining score points with a selection of vehicles at your disposal to hit the frontline and achieve victory on various landscapes featuring all four weather seasons.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-8600k or Amd Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD RX 580
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 32 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Motherboard integrated sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
